mapper.insert: insert into bt003_career ( employee_id ,certification_no ,disp_order ,start_yearmonth ,end_yearmonth ,business_content ,biko ,insert_user ,insert_date ,update_user ,update_date ) values ( #{employee_id} ,nextval('career_seq') ,cast(#{disp_order} as integer) ,#{start_yearmonth} ,#{end_yearmonth} ,#{business_content} ,#{biko} ,#{insert_user} ,NOW() ,NULL ,NULL )
mapper.select: select a.employee_id ,a.certification_no ,a.disp_order ,a.start_yearmonth ,a.end_yearmonth ,a.business_content ,a.biko from bt003_career a where a.employee_id = #{employee_id} and a.certification_no = cast(#{certification_no} as integer)

select a.employee_id ,a.employee_cd ,a.employee_name1_last ,a.employee_name1_first ,b.certification_no ,b.disp_order ,b.start_yearmonth ,b.end_yearmonth ,b.business_content ,b.biko ,string_agg( case d.technology_kbn when '01' then d.technology_name --技術区分 else null end,',' order by d.technology_name) as technology_Lang ,string_agg( case d.technology_kbn when '02' then d.technology_name --技術区分 else null end,',' order by d.technology_name) as technology_OS ,string_agg( case d.technology_kbn when '03' then d.technology_name --技術区分 else null end,',' order by d.technology_name) as technology_DB from am005_employee a inner join bt003_career b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id left join bt004_careertechnology c on b.employee_id = c.employee_id and b.certification_no = c.certification_no left join bm002_technology d on c.technology_id = d.technology_id where a.employee_id = #{employee_id} and COALESCE(b.business_content ,'') like CONCAT('%' , #{business_content} , '%') and COALESCE(b.biko,'') like CONCAT('%' , #{biko} , '%') group by a.employee_id ,a.employee_cd ,a.employee_name1_last ,a.employee_name1_first ,b.certification_no ,b.disp_order ,b.start_yearmonth ,b.end_yearmonth ,b.business_content ,b.biko order by b.disp_order ,b.start_yearmonth
